description: Historical IFTA data from reports v1. This data is needed to allow customers to view historical data after the switch over to reports v2 using data pipelines. This table is joined with the IFTA report in the combined_distance table.

schema.name: device_id
schema.description: The device id of this hour of data.

schema.name: driver_id
schema.description: The id of the driver assigned to this vehicle during this hour of data.

schema.name: jurisdiction
schema.description: The jurisdiction this hour of driving took place in.

schema.name: end_ms
schema.description: The end time in milliseconds of this hour of data.

schema.name: duration_ms
schema.description: The duration in milliseconds of this hour of data. This will always be 3,600,000 ms (1 hour).

schema.name: gps_distance_m
schema.description: The distance traveled in meters as recorded by GPS during this hour. This is calculated using our trips-based algorithm.

schema.name: odo_distance_m
schema.description: The distance traveled in meters as recorded by odometer during this hour. This is calculated using our trips-based algorithm.

schema.name: toll_distance_m
schema.description: The distance traveled in meters on toll roads during this hour. This is calculated using our trips-based algorithm.

schema.name: time_ms
schema.description: The duration the engine was running, in milliseconds, during this hour. This is calculated using our trips-based algorithm.

schema.name: tripless_gps_distance_m
schema.description: The distance traveled in meters as recorded by GPS during this hour. This is calculated using our tripless algorithm, which does not depend on trips to calculate distance.

schema.name: tripless_odo_distance_m
schema.description: The distance traveled in meters as recorded by odometer during this hour. This is calculated using our tripless algorithm, which does not depend on trips to calculate distance.

schema.name: tripless_toll_distance_m
schema.description: The distance traveled in meters on troll roads during this hour. This is calculated using our tripless algorithm, which does not depend on trips to calculate distance.

schema.name: tripless_engine_on_ms
schema.description: The duration the engine was running, in milliseconds, during this hour. This is calculated using our tripless algorithm, which does not depend on trips to calculate distance.

schema.name: use_odometer
schema.description: A boolean value that denotes whether this org was using odometer values to calculate IFTA distances during this time.

schema.name: use_tripless
schema.description: A boolean value that denotes whether this org was using the tripless algorithm to calculate IFTA distances during this time.

partitions.name: date
partitions.description: The date of this hour of data.
